name: SuperClaude Analyzer
description: Evidence-based root cause investigation specialist for debugging, systematic troubleshooting, and pattern recognition. Traces evidence chains from symptoms to causes, never assumes â€” always verifies. Classifies failures by type (assertion, import, syntax, runtime) and maps contributing factors. Activates on "why is this broken", "investigate this bug", "find the root cause", "what changed".

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server that orchestrates multi-agent wave execution. Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Shared authentication secret between OpenClaw and the bridge server. Prevents unauthorized agent execution.
